Performance Evaluation

Performance evaluation is a system designed by Ipsumtechnology, which allows you to evaluate the performance of collaborators. 

The system is designed to carry out 3 stages.

  1. Goal Capture
    2. Mid-year evaluation (MY)
    3. Year evaluation (YE)

The evaluation contemplates the capture of 5 goals with 5 initiatives.100% of the evaluation is distributed on the goals. 

Each goal can contain up to 5 initiatives, and 100% of the percentage that the goal can accumulate is distributed among the initiatives.

stages:

Target capture. 

It is a period of time that is activated, where collaborators can capture their goals and initiatives 

Goal approval

Period in which the leaders of the collaborators review and approve the goals of the collaborators

Mid-year evaluation 

This evaluation grades progress on goals and initiatives.

Year evaluation 

In this stage, the final progress of the goals and initiatives is graded.
